actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Select Education.

official_title: A bill to amend the Education of the Handicapped Act to provide that certain handicapped children shall be entitled to a free appropriate public education after they attain 21 years of age.

summary.text: Amends the Education of the Handicapped Act to provide that a free appropriate public education will be available for any handicapped child who has attained 21 years of age for a period which is at least equal in length to any period, occurring before such child attained 21 years of age, in which such child was eligible to receive, but was not provided with, such free appropriate public education.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Education of the Handicapped Act to provide that certain handicapped children shall be entitled to a free appropriate public education after they attain 21 years of age.
